metadata.title: CVE-2020-18773 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: An invalid memory access in the decode function in iptc.cpp of Exiv2 0.27.99.0 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (DOS) via a crafted tif file.

criterions.comment: exiv2 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
